name: Party Time :)
description:
Oh no! You've run late to your own party! Hopefully the guests aren't too mad. If they get too mad, make sure you don't kick them out! That could end badly.

Controls:

WASD: move

Mouse: look

Space: jump

Click: build

E: Interact/Spray

Non-jokey notes:

This game gets pretty laggy with the HTML build, I'd suggest downloading if you can.

This game also gets kinda loud. Tone down the volume if you don't like that (Escape key)

Made in one day lol. Not meant to be serious.

Current progress: Check devlogs, three days in I think.
